review: Love this little device, and learning something new every day. Like, I saw Photos on the homepage but didn't open it for days. Then I did just to check it out. Every photo on my Kindle Fire tablet is right there on my TV! And my music Playlist,  yup, there also and yesterday I added to it. Today I'm calling my cable company to cancel the movie channels because I'm enjoying all the free movies and TV series. Ok folks, if you already have Prime this device is only $39.95; it costs more than that to go to lunch and a movie one time. And I'd much rather watch the Prime movies on my 46 inch TV than a tablet ant day. I highly recommend.
